description:
This is a nice, clean and cozy one bedroom apartment near Columbus Circle. We are close to Everything you want to see! Central Park, Carnegie Hall, Museum of Modern Art, Lincoln Center, Time Square, Broadway Shows, 5th Ave shopping area, and, of course, all kinds of great food from Hell's Kitchen. The neighborhood is awesome.

5 minutes walk to Subway 1,A,B,C,D,E,N,Q,R,W train. 

We have a queen size bed and a pull out sofa bed and can accommodate up to 4 people in total.

This is a private one-bedroom apartment including 1 bedroom, 1 living room, 1 kitchen/dining room and 1 bathroom  with window for each of them.

You will have the whole apartment while your stay.

I will be traveling at the time of your stay but you are welcome to call or text me if you have any questions. And I also have friends living nearby so if you need help, they can come around.

This cozy apartment located in the center of Manhattan. The columbus circle, central park, lincoln center, rockfeller center and times square are all in the 10-15min walking distance. And also it is in the hell's kitchen district which is famous for the wonderful restaurants and bars in NYC.

The 3 subway stations for line A, B, C, D, E, N, Q, R are all in 5 mins walk distance. So it's convenient wherever you go. If you have your car, you can either street park downstairs or use the commercial parking garage across the street.
name: Nice one-bedroom apartment near columbus circle
